translation.en: [woman] So, we took a look at your CT scans. [Michael] Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Vimos los resultados de su tomografía

translation.en: [woman] And we do see a large mass in your stomach
translation.es: y notamos una masa grandeen su estómago.

translation.en: as well as several lesions on your liver.
translation.es: Además de varias heridas en su hígado.

translation.en: At this point, I recommend that you see a specialist,
translation.es: En este punto,le recomiendo que vea un especialista,

translation.en: and I can help you with a recommendation and get you a list of people.
translation.es: puedo recomendarle una lista de personas.

translation.en: -So, you think it's bad? -We don't really know,
translation.es: - Y, ¿crees que es malo?- En realidad no sabemos.

translation.en: which is why I think it's important for you to see a specialist.
translation.es: Por eso es importanteque vea a un especialista.

translation.en: He'll do a biopsy, more tests and...
translation.es: Hará una biopsia, otros exámenes y...

translation.en: What do you think though? What do you think about it?
You've seen it and all. What do you think?
-Do you know how bad it is? -At this point, I don't really know.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuán malo es? En realidad no lo sé.

translation.en: But you can tell us something, right? Can you tell us something?
translation.es: Pero nos puede decir algo, ¿verdad? ¿Puede decirnos algo?

translation.en: -[Andy] Don't you have to say-- -It's okay.

translation.es: No creo que sepa. Creo que ella...

translation.en: I think... I think... How about... All right, listen. How about this? How about I'm gonna make a statement?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal esto?¿Qué tal si digo una afirmación?

translation.en: And if it's a true statement, you don't have to correct me.
translation.es: Si es una afirmación correcta, no tienes que corregirme.

translation.en: And you don't have to say anything to me.
Okay? So is what Michael has...
Dude, that's a question. You gotta... It has to be--
translation.es: Tipo, eso fue una pregunta. Tienes que...

translation.en: It has to be a statement. All right.

translation.es: - lo que Michael tiene es incurable.- Ya basta.

translation.en: Do you understand the game? 'Cause you're not saying anything.
I don't know if that's... I don't know...
if that's cause you understand what we...
Did you see All the President's Men?
Um, remind me of your relationship. How do you know each other?
translation.es: Háblame de su relación. ¿Cómo se conocen?

translation.en: [Andy] There's still shit in the bottom of this.
translation.es: Aún queda mierda en el fondo.

translation.en: [Andy] It's gross. I'm not reaching in there.
translation.es: Es asqueroso. No meteré mis manos ahí.

translation.en: [Andy] And the ball's gonna be gross.
translation.es: - Y la bola va a estar asquerosa.- Bien.

translation.en: -[Michael] Okay. Did you serve yesterday? -[Andy] Yeah. Yeah, it's your serve.
translation.es: ¿Tú serviste ayer? Sí. Sí, tú sirves. Espera.
Sí, tú sirves. Espera. AUTOCINE DEL VALLE

translation.en: -What happened with the specialist guy? -He was special.
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con el especialista? Era especial.

translation.en: I'll... tell you what happened at lunch today.
translation.es: Te voy... a decir lo que pasó hoy en el almuerzo.

translation.en: I was at the diner next to my office.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó?- Estaba en este restaurante, - al lado de mi oficina- Sí.
- al lado de mi oficina- Sí.

translation.en: I had that booth by the window, and...
translation.es: Estaba sentado junto a la ventana. Y...

translation.en: this guy floats by the window. Guy just floats by the window.
translation.es: este tipo flota por la ventana. Flota por la ventana.

translation.en: I mean, he floats. I mean, I just see... I can't see his bottom. Yeah.
translation.es: - Flota. No pude ver la parte de abajo.- Sí.

translation.en: His bottom ain't moving. You can tell he's not moving. You know...
translation.es: Sus pies no se mueven.Ves que no se está moviendo.

translation.en: -He was probably on a hover board. -Skateboard?
translation.es: - Quizás estaba en una tabla flotante.- ¿Patineta?

translation.en: No, that... You know, those things those kids do. They put it on their feet--
translation.es: No, sabes de esas cosasque los chicos hacen.

translation.en: Yeah, I know he was on a hover board but it just started me thinking.
translation.es: Sé que tenía una tabla flotantepero me puso a pensar.

translation.en: Can you imagine that? That would screw up your whole life.
If you saw a guy hover, so what?
translation.es: Si viste a un chico flotar. ¿Y qué?

translation.en: So, life's normal for you right after that?
translation.es: Entonces la vida es normalpara ti después de eso.

translation.en: I don't have a problem with it.
So, all rules of reality, thousands of years of science,
translation.es: Entonces, toda la práctica, toda la experiencia en ciencia,

translation.en: everything, now means nothing? It means nothing?
translation.es: Todo, ya no significa nada.No significa nada.

translation.en: You wouldn't be cool. You wouldn't be cool if a guy...
translation.es: No estarías bien. No estarías bien si un chico...
- Claro que sí.- No, no estarías.

translation.en: No, you wouldn't. If there was no rules.
translation.es: - Claro que sí.- No, no estarías. Como si no hubieran reglas.

translation.en: You go to put your sneakers on, and they're pumpkins.
translation.es: Te pones tus tenis y son calabazas.

translation.en: You blow your nose, a nickel comes out.
translation.es: Te soplas la nariz y sale un centavo.

translation.en: You look in the mirror, your face is a...
translation.es: Te miras en el espejo y tu cara es un...

translation.en: I know you're bullshitting. Give me my thing.
translation.es: Sé que estás jodiendo. Dame mi cuestión.

translation.en: My hands are airplanes so just don't look.
translation.es: Mis manos son aviones así que no mires.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, get on one of them
translation.es: Claro. Súbete a una de ellas

translation.en: and fly to fucking where guys don't hover.
translation.es: y vuela a donde no floten los chicos.
Porque ahí es donde yo vivo.

translation.en: What are you doing? That's the death punch.
Your death punch is extremely powerful, huh?
translation.es: Tu golpe mortales extremadamente poderoso, ¿o no?

translation.en: -There was five. I took three. -That's not okay.
translation.es: Habían cinco, me llevé tres. Eso no está bien.

translation.en: One's a... One's dwarf one, so it evens out.
translation.es: Uno es un enano así que estamos a mano.

translation.en: Sure hope to see you tomorrow night.
translation.es: Espero verte mañana por la noche.

translation.en: Yeah, Trivial Pursuit. I won the last two of those.
translation.es: Sí, Trivial Pursuit. Gané los últimos dos.

translation.en: Did you have a good weekend?
[Andy] The new girl. She said, "How are you?"
translation.es: La nueva chica. Ella dijo: "¿Cómo estás?".

translation.en: [Michael] Oh, God, small talk. How'd it go?
translation.es: Oh, Dios, charla ligera. ¿Cómo te fue?

translation.en: [Dr. Laurey on phone] Unfortunately, your white blood count is...
translation.es: Por desgracia,su recuento de glóbulos blancos...

translation.en: Uh-huh. And what are my options?
[Dr. Laurey] Well, there are a few options.
[Master] You fool! Now you've done it!
You death punched your own master! [laughs]
translation.es: ¡Le hiciste un golpe mortal a tu maestro!

translation.en: [Michael] I got it. I got it.

translation.es: - Somos el equipo de segundo tiempo.- Sí.

translation.en: half-time speech if I was a coach. I...
translation.es: discurso de medio tiemposi yo fuera el entrenador, yo...

translation.en: I really have this best speech I've ever heard at half-time.
translation.es: en realidad tengoel mejor discurso que he escuchado.

translation.en: -[Michael] What is it? -[Andy] I'm working on it.
-I made the shirt. I know it's not-- -You made it about two years ago.
translation.es: Yo hice la camisa. Sé que no lo es. Ya hace dos años.¿Aún recuerdas lo que es?

translation.en: -You still remember what it is? -It was a year and a half ago,
translation.es: Ya hace dos años.¿Aún recuerdas lo que es? Fue hace un año y medioy si fuese "cerdo graso", fuera diferente.

translation.en: and if it was "fatty pork", there'd be two T's.
translation.es: Fue hace un año y medioy si fuese "cerdo graso", fuera diferente.

translation.en: There'd be another T right there.
It's a "satay fork." Little fork. Little appetizer fork.
translation.es: Es "tenedor de satay". El tenedor pequeño. De aperitivo.

translation.en: No, it's not-- Nothing in the kitchen. Get out of the kitchen.
translation.es: No, no lo es... Nada que sea de la cocina.

translation.en: I'll give you that info, and that's it.
That's a good one. That was a year and a half...
translation.es: Esa es buena. Eso fue un año y medio...

translation.en: Sort of think... I like that it bothers you.
translation.es: Algo así... Me gusta que eso te incomode.

translation.en: Did you eat my cashews? I have no cashews left.
translation.es: ¿Comiste de mis anacardos? No me quedan anacardos.

translation.en: I could tell you. Want me to tell you?
I saw a second oncologist. He, um...
translation.es: Vi a un segundo oncólogo. Él...

translation.en: You know, there's nothing they can do.
The hospital, the tubes, the bloating. I don't want any part of that.
translation.es: El hospital, los tubos, la hinchazón. No quiero nada de eso.

translation.en: They got a whole process. If you get less than six months they give you this...
translation.es: Tienen un procedimiento. Si te diagnostican menos de seis meses
te dan unas pastillas para tomar.

translation.en: And you can do it at home.
But I don't want to do it alone and...
I was hoping you would help me out.
You gotta... You can't give up. Huh? You gotta...
You can't do that. Miracles happen, right?
translation.es: No puedes hacer eso. Los milagros suceden, ¿cierto?

translation.en: What about the guys who say, "You got six months to live" and...
translation.es: ¿Qué tal a los que le dicen, "Tienes seis meses para vivir" y...

translation.en: next thing you know, he's climbing Mount Everest.
translation.es: de repente, escalan el monte Everest.

translation.en: Jim Abbott had one arm. Remember Jim Abbott on the Yankees?
translation.es: Jim Abbott tenía un brazo.¿Recuerdas el de los Yankees?

translation.en: They already gave me the prescription.
They can do that? They can just give you that...
I don't want you to look at me like this.
translation.es: No quiero que me mires así.

translation.en: But I was not gonna tell you 'cause I didn't want it to change things, you know?
translation.es: No quería que cambiaran las cosas,por eso no te iba a decir.

translation.en: I want to make some pizzas.
I want to watch some movies.
I want to play some Paddleton.
Should we play the second half?
[Andy] These are all pretty far away.
translation.es: Todos los sitios están bien lejos.

translation.en: The places where your doctor said we could fulfill the...
translation.es: Los sitios que tu médico dijo para buscar...
la receta. El más cercano es...

translation.en: [Andy] A lot of pharmacies won't fill it 'cause of moral reasons.
translation.es: Muchas farmacias no la dan por razones morales.

translation.en: All right, Guess we're gonna do a little road trip.
translation.es: Creo que vamos a hacer una excursión.

translation.en: What does that mean? Road trip?
You don't just do a road trip, right?
What do you mean, what does that mean?
We'll drive there. We'll get the meds, we'll find a place...
translation.es: Vamos a conducir. Buscamos las medicinas,encontramos un lugar...

translation.en: Your stove burnt the pizza up. It's burnt.
translation.es: Tu estufa quemó la pizza. Está quemada.

translation.en: We can't eat that. We gotta eat something else.
translation.es: No podemos comer eso.Tenemos que comer algo más.

translation.en: -[Michael] It's not that bad. -What are we gonna eat?
translation.es: - No está tan mal.- ¿Qué vamos a comer?

translation.en: -Nice work. -Look at that piece of shit!
translation.es: - Muy bien.- ¡Mira ese pedazo de mierda!

translation.en: [Andy] How about the air in the tires?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal el aire de los neumáticos?

translation.en: [Michael] Yeah, I put a bunch in. It's okay.
There's no such thing as too much air.
translation.es: No hay tal cosa como demasiado aire.

translation.en: Yeah, but it was too much.
[Andy] Hey, I had some oatmeal so I'm gonna need a bathroom in two hours.
translation.es: Oye, comí avena así que en 2 horas voy a necesitar un baño.

translation.en: [Michael] But you also had a second coffee, so maybe 90 minutes?
translation.es: Pero también tomaste otro café, así que tal vez, ¿en 90 minutos?

translation.en: -[Michael] What do you see? -I see everything.
I see everything. Yeah, I do. There's a tree. There's a...
translation.es: Sí, veo. Hay un árbol. Hay un...

translation.en: If you had to live like this...
You could adapt. That's the great thing about the human mind.
translation.es: Podrías adaptarte.Eso es lo grandioso de la mente humana.
Así es como las abejas ven.

translation.en: [Andy] How many wishes would a genie have to give you where...
translation.es: ¿Cuántos deseos tendríaque darte un genio si uno de esos...

translation.en: one of those wishes would be sand off?

translation.es: Cada vez que dijiste "quitarte la arena"...

translation.en: every grain of sand that was on your body fell off.
translation.es: es cada grano de arenaque se cae de tu cuerpo.

translation.en: No, ten. If they gave me ten, I would do it.
translation.es: No, diez.Si me dieran diez, yo lo haría.

translation.en: You can only think of nine wishes before you get to sand off?
translation.es: ¿Solo puedes pensar en nueve deseosantes de que te quites la arena?

translation.en: Then a billion dollars, flying, whatever.
translation.es: Mil millones de dólares, volar, lo que sea.

translation.en: Invisible, and then sand off, yeah. Well, pajamas on.
translation.es: Invisible, luego quitarse la arena. Con pijamas puestas.

translation.en: Pajamas... It's late at night, you're tired. "Pajamas on."
translation.es: Con pijamas... Es tarde en la noche, estás cansado. "Con pijamas".

translation.en: [Michael] I think there's a buffer. I think we're okay.
translation.es: Hay reserva. Creo que estamos bien.

translation.en: Well, not that big a buffer.
What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el peor escenario? Estar sin gas.

translation.en: What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas here, right?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el peor escenario? Quedarnos sin gas, ¿cierto?

translation.en: Next thing you know, we're drinking our urine.
translation.es: Y de repente,estamos bebiendo nuestra orina.

translation.en: How do you get from running out of gas, the next step is drinking urine?
translation.es: ¿Cómo de quedarnos sin gas llegas a beber nuestra orina?

translation.en: We'll call somebody. We'll walk to the gas station.
translation.es: Llamamos a alguien.Caminamos a la gasolinera.

translation.en: -There's nobody out here. -You go right to drinking urine.
translation.es: - No hay nadie aquí.- Te vas directo a beber orina.

translation.en: [Andy] It's like Twilight Zone out here.
translation.es: Esto es como una zona de fantasmas.

translation.en: [Michael] How's that half-time speech coming, by the way?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va el discurso de medio tiempo?

translation.en: I could sell it. But if I told it to a coach,
translation.es: Yo lo vendería.Si se lo contara a un entrenador...

translation.en: they'd want to buy it from me.
-[Michael] That's more like it -[Andy] That's the beginning.
-[Andy] Who is that? What's that? -[Michael] It's my sister.
She knows about the cancer, but not about the other stuff.
translation.es: Ella sabe sobre el cáncer, pero no sobre las otras cosas.

translation.en: I kind of want to keep that to myself.
She does small talk, your sister?

translation.es: La granja de avestruces. A tres millas.

translation.en: -I've never seen an ostrich. -I've seen them.
translation.es: - Nunca he visto un avestruz.- Los he visto.

translation.en: -I've seen them on TV. -Yeah, but in person, though.
translation.es: - En la televisión.- Sí, pero en persona...
De hecho, el animal más rápido.
- No creo que lo sea.- Sí.

translation.en: Yes, it is. Forty miles an hour.
translation.es: Sí, lo es. Cuarenta millas por hora.

translation.en: [Michael] Okay, I think we're getting close.
translation.es: Ok, creo que nos estamos acercando.

translation.en: [Michael] Looks like a tourist town or something.
translation.es: Parece una ciudad turística o algo así.

translation.en: [Andy] A lot of windmills in this town.
translation.es: Muchos molinos de viento en esta ciudad.

translation.en: We talk to the guy, Phil, and we got a plan, right? Okay.
translation.es: Hablamos con el chico, Phil, y tenemos un plan, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: This sinus infection is so awful.
-[pharmacist] I know. -And I feel like I...
I feel like this medication I've taken before and it hasn't worked.
translation.es: el medicamento que tomé no me ha funcionado.

translation.en: -Have a good rest of the day. -Thank you.
Hi, guys. What can I do for you?
Hi, there. We're here to see Phil.
translation.es: Hola. Estamos aquí para ver a Phil.

translation.en: Phil's not in today. I'm Dave. I'm standing in for Phil.
translation.es: Phil, no está hoy. Soy Dave, estoy sustituyendo a Phil.

translation.en: We talked to Phil though. You spoke to Phil.
translation.es: Ya hablamos con Phil. Hablaste con Phil.

translation.en: -Okay. So we should come back. -But I can help you guys.
-This is kind of top secret. -I spoke to Phil. It's a...
translation.es: Esto es algo en secreto. Ya hablé con Phil. Es...

translation.en: He was gonna... It's a special medication he was gonna...
translation.es: Él iba a.. Es un medicamento especial que iba a...

translation.en: You want to call Phil maybe?
It's okay. I can handle it. Yeah.
translation.es: - Está bien. Yo puedo hacerlo.- Sí.

translation.en: I don't like that. We should come back for Phil. Let's come back.
translation.es: No me gusta esto. Deberíamos regresar por Phil.

translation.en: [Michael] Why are you so obsessed with Phil?
[Andy] What if he puts something wrong in there. Could be dangerous.
translation.es: Qué tal si pone algo mal ahí.Podría ser peligroso.

translation.en: Give me one second. I'll get you guys dialed in here.
translation.es: Dame un segundo.Pueden marcar desde aquí.

translation.en: All right. How are you guys doing today?
-There are three medicines involved. -We know all this part.
translation.es: - Hay tres medicamentos involucrados.- Sabemos toda esa parte.

translation.en: This is what we did with Phil. That's why...
translation.es: Ya hicimos esto con Phil.Es por eso.

translation.en: If Phil was here he wouldn't say that to us
translation.es: Si Phil estuviera aquí, no diría eso,

translation.en: 'cause we already spoke to him about it.
I understand, but Phil told me I had to read these instructions.
translation.es: Entiendo, pero Phil me dijoque tenía que leer las instrucciones.

translation.en: Okay, so you'll be taking two of these one hour before taking the drink.
translation.es: Bueno, tomarás dos de estasuna hora antes de tomar la bebida.

translation.en: This one is for nausea. It'll keep you from vomiting.
translation.es: Esta es para las náuseas.Te evitará vomitar.

translation.en: And this one ran all the way home.
translation.es: Y esta es hasta llegar a la casa.

translation.en: Um, and in the event of vomiting after ingesting the drink,
translation.es: Y en caso de vómitos despuésde ingerir la bebida,

translation.en: the patient should have a family member contact
translation.es: el paciente debe tenerun contacto familiar

translation.en: their referring physician to determine a course of action.
translation.es: y su médico de referenciapara determinar un plan de acción.

translation.en: is the medicine you'll be taking last.
translation.es: es la medicina que tomarás al final.

translation.en: There are 100 pills in this bottle,
which is the lethal dose. [clears throat]
translation.es: el cual tiene la dosis letal.

translation.en: Can you ring it up now?
-You're not paying for this. -Oh, no. Yeah.
translation.es: - No vas a pagar por esto.- Sí.

translation.en: I didn't tell you about this, but here, take the card.
translation.es: No te hablé de esto, pero toma la tarjeta.

translation.en: -Take the card and ring it up. -Andy, it's $3,500.
translation.es: Toma la tarjeta. Andy, son 3500 dólares.

translation.en: I know what it is. I have more money than you.
translation.es: Sé lo que es. Tengo más dinero que tú.

translation.en: -I want to do this. -It's a lot.
-[card swipe machine beeps] -I'm sorry, sir. Your card was declined.
translation.es: Lo siento, señor. Su tarjeta fue rechazada.

translation.en: It's not declined. You gotta put it through.
translation.es: No está rechazada. Tienes que pasarla.

translation.en: My mistake. I'll give it another shot.
translation.es: Mi culpa. Voy a tratar otra vez.

translation.en: You know that those things glitch a lot.
-Give me the card. -I'll pay for it.
I'm just gonna call the bank up, that's all.
translation.es: Voy a llamar al banco, es todo.

translation.en: -I can pay for it and you pay me back. -Give me your phone.
translation.es: - Puedo pagar y tú me pagas.- Dame tu teléfono.

translation.en: Give me your phone. Don't ring anything up,
'cause this'll take one second. I'm gonna call the number right there.
translation.es: porque esto tomará un segundo.Voy a llamar al número.

translation.en: I see the number right there. Give me one second. Don't ring anything up.
translation.es: Veo el número ahí. Dame un segundo. No llames.

translation.en: You will have to empty the contents
of all 100 pills into a glass
translation.es: de las 100 pastillas en un vaso

translation.en: -and mix them with half a cup of water. -It's Andy Freedman.
translation.es: y mezclarlas con media taza de agua. Es Andy Freedman.

translation.en: The drink will be a little bitter, but you want to drink it all at once.
translation.es: La bebida será un poco amarga,querrás beberla toda de una vez.

translation.en: [Andy] It's me, though. What do you want me to tell you?
translation.es: Soy yo. ¿Qué quieres que te diga?

translation.en: [Dave] If the patient decides they don't...
translation.es: Si el paciente decide que no...

translation.en: want to end their life after ingesting
translation.es: quiere terminar su vida después de ingerir
deben contactar los serviciosmédicos de emergencia

translation.en: -to begin lifesaving measures. -[Andy] I'm not yelling.
translation.es: - para comenzar medidas vitales.- No estoy gritando.

translation.en: -I'll stop yelling, but I'm not yelling. -Yeah.
translation.es: Dejaré de gritar, pero no estoy gritando.

translation.en: [Andy] Well, send it then. They're gonna send a code.
That's why you're supposed to have a phone.
translation.es: Por eso es que debes tener un teléfono.

translation.en: I have e-mail. Can I see my e-mail on your e-mail?
translation.es: Tengo e-email. ¿Puedo ver mi e-mail en el suyo?

translation.en: Uh, Phil has his log-in codes. I don't have it.
translation.es: Phil tiene sus códigos de acceso. Yo no.

translation.en: See? Why don't we wait for Phil? Let's just wait for Phil to come back,
translation.es: ¿Por qué no esperamos a Phil?Esperemos que Phil regrese,

translation.en: -And none of this happens. -It's gonna be fine
Hold on. I sent you my pet name about five years ago.
translation.es: Espera. Te envié mi nombre de mascotahace unos cinco años.

translation.en: Is that it? Are we done?
Yes, yes. Uh, yeah, I read it all.
-Let me just pay for it. I got it. -[Andy] Yeah. Why...
translation.es: - Déjame pagar. Lo tengo.- Sí. Por qué...

translation.en: [Andy] Where does my pet name go?
translation.es: ¿A dónde fue mi nombre de mascota?

translation.en: What do you mean? I'm taking a pain pill.
translation.es: ¿Qué dices?Tomo una pastilla para el dolor.

translation.en: Hi, we have a reservation for...
You're all set. I just need a credit card for incidentals...
translation.es: Listo. Solo necesito una tarjetade crédito para imprevistos...

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna give you a credit card, but if you could wait until the end to
translation.es: Te doy una tarjeta de crédito, pero sipudieras esperar hasta el final para...

translation.en: do whatever you have to do with it. I'll call the bank,
translation.es: hacer lo que tengas que hacer.Llamaré al banco,

translation.en: -and it's all gonna be fine. -Let me just...
translation.es: - y todo va a estar bien.- Deja que...

translation.en: [Andy] Okay, you get it. Put it on his card, but I'm paying for it.
translation.es: Bueno, ponlo en su tarjeta,pero yo lo voy pagar.

translation.en: -I'm gonna pay it all back, okay? -That's fine.

translation.es: - Es 79 por noche, ¿cierto?- Sí, lo es.

translation.en: So, guys, I got you, um...
We have another room with a king.
translation.es: Hay otro cuarto con cama king.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Not two rooms. Would you prefer to have a king?
translation.es: Disculpa. No dos cuartos.¿Prefieres tener uno con cama king?

translation.en: If you feel more comfortable, we're fine with that.
translation.es: Si se sienten cómodos,no hay problema con eso.

translation.en: Guess I'll take that then, right?
translation.es: Creo que me la llevo entonces, ¿verdad?

translation.en: [Andy] The bag. I'll hold the bag.
translation.es: La bolsa. Me llevo la bolsa.

translation.en: Keep it in my house just so we know where it is.
translation.es: La dejamos en mi casapara saber donde está.

translation.en: Just assumed, you know, I'd hold onto it.
translation.es: a que puedo asumir esa responsabilidad.

translation.en: I got a safe place in my closet. Up behind the, uh...
translation.es: Tengo un lugar seguro en mi armario. Detrás de la...

translation.en: The Rod Carew rookie card. I got that little...
translation.es: la cromo de béisbol de Rod Carew. Tengo...

translation.en: I don't think anybody's gonna steal it.
translation.es: No creo que nadie la robe.

translation.en: [Andy] Who knows? Sandy got broken into two times and she's on the ground floor.
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe? A Sandy se le metieron dos veces y está en la planta baja.

translation.en: They always go to the ground floor first.
translation.es: Siempre van a la planta baja primero.

translation.en: I'm up on top. If the water main breaks...
translation.es: Estoy arriba. Si se rompe la tubería principal...

translation.en: over on Hillside and then it floods, I'm up top.
translation.es: en la ladera y luego se inunda, estoy arriba.

translation.en: I slept for a long time, sorry.
Now we got nothing to worry about.
-All right, very funny. -[Andy] It was my idea.
translation.es: Sí, muy gracioso. Fue mi idea.

translation.en: It's not funny. That's a good idea.
translation.es: No es gracioso. Es una buena idea.

translation.en: Where's the medication? Where is it?
We don't got to worry about any of that stuff we were talking about.
translation.es: No tenemos que preocuparnos por nada.

translation.en: Andy, I don't want to play a game right now.
translation.es: Andy, no quiero juegos ahora mismo.

translation.en: -Can you give me the code? -No, just don't worry about it.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes darme el código?- No te preocupes.

translation.en: [Michael] Maybe we should try getting a drink.
translation.es: Tal vez deberíamos ir por una bebida.

translation.en: [woman] Uh, the sign-up list is still open.
translation.es: La lista de registro todavía está abierta.

translation.en: Honestly, if you don't want to do anything, it's just gonna be more of me.
translation.es: Sinceramente, si no quieren hacerlo. Voy a persistir.

translation.en: I think I'm gonna start drinking.
translation.es: Creo que voy a beber más seguido.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, it's not good for you, but it is good.
translation.es: Seguro, no es bueno para la salud,pero es bueno.

translation.en: It's not ready yet. I don't want to jinx it.
translation.es: Aún no está listo. No quiero arruinarlo.

translation.en: I stumbled on something that's really gonna be something.
translation.es: Busqué algo que va a ser bueno.

translation.en: You think I'm lying about that? Why would I lie about it?
translation.es: ¿Crees que mentiría? ¿Por qué mentiría sobre eso?

translation.en: Remember that time you told me you spoke Spanish and then...
translation.es: Recuerdas cuando dijisteque hablabas español y...

translation.en: I over-exaggerated how much I knew,
but that's because I was trying to impress you. We weren't friends yet.
translation.es: era para tratar de impresionarte. Todavía no éramos amigos.

translation.en: Do me a favor, guys. Close your eyes.
translation.es: Háganme un favor. Cierren sus ojos.

translation.en: I want you to close your eyes.
Everybody, close your eyes. I want you to picture something.
translation.es: Quiero que cierren sus ojosy se imaginen algo.

translation.en: We're gonna lose this game, guys.
translation.es: Chicos, vamos a perder este juego.

translation.en: Just listen to me. I'm not gonna lie to you.
translation.es: Solo escúchenme. No les voy a mentir.

translation.en: No matter what I say here, that ain't gonna turn it around.
translation.es: No importa lo que diga, eso no va a cambiar nada.

translation.en: But so what? I'm proud of you.
translation.es: ¿Y eso qué? Estoy orgulloso de ustedes.

translation.en: I'm proud of you. I don't want to wait to the end
translation.es: Estoy orgulloso de ustedes.No voy a esperar el final

translation.en: when you're hurting to say that. You guy's are...
You're gonna have good lives. You're all good guys. You're gonna...
translation.es: Tendrán buenas vidas.Ustedes son buenos chicos. Van a...

translation.en: You're gonna be something in your life.
translation.es: Van a ser algo en sus vidas.

translation.en: Murphy, you're gonna be in the Navy, right?
translation.es: Murphy, vas a ir al ejercito, ¿correcto?

translation.en: You're gonna be a hero one day.
translation.es: Algún día vas a ser un héroe.
Vas a vivir en algún lugar...

translation.en: You're gonna live in Connecticut somewhere.
And you'll have a drinking problem maybe, but that makes you a better writer.
translation.es: Quizás tengas problemas con la bebida, pero eso te hace un mejor escritor.

translation.en: You're gonna have great lives, and maybe you're gonna have a...
translation.es: Van a tener grandes vidasy tal vez tengan...

translation.en: a little empty feeling in your gut.
translation.es: un sentimiento vacío en sus entrañas.

translation.en: And maybe when you lay at night, secretly you're gonna think...
translation.es: Quizás cuando se acuesten en la noche, pensarán a escondidas...

translation.en: This is all good, but if I could ever go back...
translation.es: Todo está bien, pero si pudiera regresar...

translation.en: If I could go back in time I would go to the day we lost that big game
translation.es: si pudiera regresar en el tiempo iría al día que perdimos ese gran partido

translation.en: and I would play that second half over again."
translation.es: y jugaría esa segunda mitad otra vez".

translation.en: Well, guess what guys? Open your eyes! You're back!
translation.es: Bueno chicos, ¿saben qué?Abran sus ojos. ¡Están de vuelta!

translation.en: -Okay, now I got it. -[man] Oh, there he is.
translation.es: - Bueno, ya lo tengo.- Vaya, ahí llegó.

translation.en: He was alone. Nobody likes to be alone. I invited him.
translation.es: Él estaba solo.A nadie le gusta estar solo. Lo invité.

translation.en: Okay, all right. So, now you're over here now?
-Yeah, have a little-- -Get out of my seat.
translation.es: - Seguro, vamos a...- Sal de mi asiento.

translation.en: [Michael] No, you stay. You sit. Andy, take my seat.
translation.es: No, quédate. Siéntate. Andy, toma mi asiento.

translation.en: So, David was telling me he's a kung fu fan.
translation.es: David me decía que es un fanáticode artes marciales.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Of course. You're that too.
-All right. -Yeah. I like kung fu. You like kung fu?
translation.es: - Bien.- Me gusta las artes marciales. ¿Y a ti?

translation.en: Well, have you watched Death Punch?
Not a lot of fighting in it, you know, but...
It's a kung fu movie. It's not about fighting.
translation.es: Es una película de artes marciales.No se trata de pelea.

translation.en: It's learning about what's inside yourself.
translation.es: Se trata de aprender acercade lo que tienes dentro de ti.
Eso es lo que es golpe mortal.

translation.en: -You didn't see that? -I... Well, you know...
I saw it on YouTube. Maybe I missed some parts. So, you know...
translation.es: La vi en YouTube.Quizás no vi algunas partes.

translation.en: The sign-up list is still open.
[Andy] How can you see it on YouTube? You can't see it on YouTube.
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedes verlo en YouTube?No puedes verlo ahí.

translation.en: I don't mean to be, uh... [grunts]
How can you find it on DVD?
You can find it on DVD. You can find it on a VHS.
translation.es: Puedes verlo en disco DVD.También en videograbadora.

translation.en: I recommend watching it on VHS.
-Because that's how it's meant to be seen. -Hi, everybody. My name's Michael.
translation.es: - Porque así es como debe ser vista.- Hola. Mi nombre es Michael.

translation.en: I want to honor a movie called Death Punch.
translation.es: Quiero honrar la película Death Punch.

translation.en: It's my favorite movie in the world.

translation.es: Es mi película favorita. Nadie... la ha visto. Siempre tratamos de quela gente la vea y no lo hacen.

translation.en: We're always trying to get people to watch it, and they don't.
translation.es: la ha visto. Siempre tratamos de quela gente la vea y no lo hacen.

translation.en: Um, it's hard to find, but it's very important to me.
translation.es: Es difícil de encontrarla, pero es muy importante para mí.
un joven que estudia artes marciales...

translation.en: in the mountains. His moves are graceful and powerful,
translation.es: en las montañas. Sus movimientos sonelegantes y poderosos, pero le falta algo.
Sus movimientos sonelegantes y poderosos, pero le falta algo.

translation.en: He's attacked by the Master Liu.
translation.es: Él es atacado por el Maestro Lu.

translation.en: And a great battle ensues and...
translation.es: Y se produce una gran pelea y...

translation.en: And Liu winds up for what will become known as the Death Punch.
translation.es: Lu es acabado por lo que se conocecomo el Death Punch.
Pero lo que pasa es que...

translation.en: Chien and he hits the barrel because...
translation.es: Chen y él golpean el barril porque...

translation.en: Sorry, I told it wrong. I shouldn't have...
translation.es: Lo siento, lo dije mal. No debería...
Tienen una relaciónde maestro y estudiante,

translation.en: but you think they're enemies and that's why it's funny when he hits the barrel
translation.es: crees que son enemigos, por esoes gracioso cuando golpea el barril

translation.en: because you think that it's, um...
I kind of messed that up, sorry. But back to the story.
translation.es: Lo siento, me equivoqué. Como decía.

translation.en: The water starts to jiggle, and Chien sees it and he says,
translation.es: El agua comienza a sacudirse y Chen la ve y dice

translation.en: But, anyhow, this is kind of where you have to see the movie.
translation.es: En fin, esta es la parte que tienenque ver de la película.

translation.en: Anyway, it's a cool shot because the barrel starts to shake, right?
translation.es: Es una gran toma porque el barrilempieza a temblar, ¿me entienden?

translation.en: It's rumbling. It's going crazy and...
translation.es: Está retumbando.Se está volviendo loco y...

translation.en: And suddenly, the barrel explodes with water.
translation.es: Y de repente, el barril explota con agua.

translation.en: If I had landed that punch, your fate would have been sealed.
translation.es: Si te hubiese golpeado,tu destino estuviese sellado.

translation.en: Three steps in any direction, and your heart would explode.
translation.es: Tres pasos en cualquier dirección,y explotado será tu corazón.

translation.en: Chien, he's stubborn and he learns the Death Punch anyway, by himself.
translation.es: Chen, es terco y de todos modo aprende el Death Punch solo.

translation.en: Alone he learns it. On the hill without a shirt on.
translation.es: Lo aprende solo. En la colina sin camisa.

translation.en: -Yeah, that part where he trains. -[Andy] Right.
translation.es: - Sí, la parte que entrena,- Cierto.

translation.en: Ku Woo Tai shows up with 15 ninjas.
translation.es: Goh Wutai aparece con quince ninjas.

translation.en: Yes, and put him in a chokehold.
translation.es: Y le hizo la llave asfixiante.

translation.en: [Michael] Here you go. You avoid it.
-What have I done? -Do you see what happens?

translation.es: Creo que vamos para este lado.

translation.en: Smells though, right? Does it smell a little? Like meat.
translation.es: Aunque huele, ¿verdad?¿Hueles algo? Como a carne.

translation.en: What do you mean you smell meat?
-We're in a pot like soup. -I don't smell it.
translation.es: - Estamos en una olla de sopa.- No huelo nada.

translation.en: Let's get some people in here.
I'm gonna go to the bar. I'm gonna get the open-mic girl,
translation.es: Voy a ir al bar a buscar la chica del micrófono abierto,

translation.en: and I'm gonna get David. -Oh, no. -Go get your friend David.
translation.es: - y voy a buscar a David.- Ah, no.
No vas a buscar a David.

translation.en: I almost killed that guy, and he said, uh...
translation.es: Yo casi mato a ese tipo cuando dijo...

translation.en: I'm sorry, I was just trying to...
-Oh, it's not your fault. -No, I was, you know...
translation.es: No es tu culpa. No, yo estaba, ya sabes...
Ah, mierda. La señora está aquí.

translation.en: Duck. Duck, duck, duck. Get under water.

translation.es: - No venga.- Es en contra de las reglas.

translation.en: No, we're... You don't want to see...
[receptionist] You guys are so adorable. You know that?
I mean, like from the very first moment,
translation.es: Quiero decir, desde el primer momento,

translation.en: when you checked in, we could really feel that you were totally in love.
translation.es: cuando se registraron, podíamos sentirque estaban totalmente enamorados.
- Amamos a esos chicos.- Cada cual es lindo.

translation.en: -[Michael] We're neighbors. So... -[Andy] We're just neighbors.
translation.es: Somos vecinos. Así que... Solo somos vecinos.

translation.en: -with the rest of the world. -And it's great.
translation.es: - Y es genial.-  No, lo siento.

translation.en: It was such a strong thing that we just assumed.
translation.es: Resultó ser algo tan fuerteque lo asumimos.

translation.en: Oh, so we... Okay, we're not wearing clothes, so we're...
translation.es: Ah, entonces nosotros... Bien, no tenemos ropa, entonces estamos...

translation.en: He got naked so I got naked. That's the only reason I got naked.
translation.es: Él se desnudó, yo me desnudé.La razón por la que me desnudé.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -What do you mean he's right here?
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir con que está aquí?
- Está por todo el alrededor.- Espera.

translation.en: He passed away a few years ago.
Yeah. We ran this place together for a long time, and he's here.
translation.es: Manejamos este lugar por mucho tiempo, y él está aquí.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm just bad at small talk. I've never been good at it.
translation.es: Lo siento, no soy buena teniendoconversaciones.

translation.en: -I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable. -I hate it.
translation.es: - No quise ponerlos incómodos.- Lo odio.

translation.en: I work in an office, and that's all they do.
translation.es: Trabajo en una oficinay eso es todo lo que hacen.

translation.en: -Yeah. I don't like it. -[receptionist] So stupid, right?
I keep trying to think of some kind of better opening conversation line.
translation.es: Trato de pensar en mejores líneaspara abrir una conversación.

translation.en: I've been worrying about how to really do it. Something like...
translation.es: Acerca de cómo hacerlo. Algo como...

translation.en: You want to talk? If you don't, it's okay.
translation.es: ¿Quieres hablar? Si no quieres, está bien.

translation.en: And now I'm gonna go over here.
translation.es: Y ahora voy a ir para acá.

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna hit the hay, guys.
translation.es: Muy bien, voy a irme a dormir.
- No, no puedes irte.- ¿A dónde vas?

translation.en: -We just got started... -I gotta get some rest.
Okay, well, we have to go.
-You don't have to come. You can stay. -No, I'm gonna go.
translation.es: - No tienes que venir. Puedes quedarte.- No, me voy a ir.

translation.en: -I'm gonna go, too. -I'm just gonna go sleep in the room.
translation.es: - Yo también me voy.- Voy a dormir en el cuarto.

translation.en: -You have to be quiet. -[receptionist] You go.
translation.es: - Tienes que hacer silencio.- Tú te vas.

translation.en: I don't have a key, though. I don't have a key.
It's okay. I got a lot of keys.
You got a lot of them in the...

translation.es: - Estaba equivocada.- Lo siento por eso.

translation.en: 'Cause we're over here and he's over there, right? [chuckles]
translation.es: Nosotros estamos aquíy él por allá, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Yeah, well, he's always with me.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, él siempre está conmigo.
- No.- No, está bien. Está bien.

translation.en: -Why'd you wake me up? -Why are you screaming?
You looked like you were dead.
[Andy] Hey, Michael, I need an aspirin or something.
My head. I got... I was a little drunk.
translation.es: Mi cabeza. Tengo... Estaba un poco borracho.

translation.en: -Did you see the guy-- -[Michael] Hey, good morning.
translation.es: - Has visto al chico...- Hola, buenos días.

translation.en: What are you... You're over here?
Yeah. I was looking at the fire. I was waiting for you to get up.
translation.es: Miraba el fuego.Estaba esperando a que te levantaras.

translation.en: -I thought we'd get some pancakes. -Oh, you're watching the fire?
translation.es: - Pensé que íbamos por unos panqueques.- ¿Mirando el fuego?

translation.en: Yeah, you ever just watch a fire?
-So nice. -Yeah. You should've woke me though.
-You okay? What's wrong with you? -All right. Whatever.
I'm all right. I'm hungry, that's all.
translation.es: Estoy bien. Tengo hambre, es todo.

translation.en: What do you want to do?
I went outside. I thought you were down there.
translation.es: Fui afuera. Pensé que estabas allá abajo.

translation.en: I went down the block. I saw...
I saw a bunch of people, you know?
translation.es: Vi a un montón de gente, ¿sabes?

translation.en: -All right. Let me go to the room. -I want pancakes. All right.
translation.es: - Voy a ir al cuarto.- Panqueques. De acuerdo.

translation.en: What do you mean, "What're you doing"?

translation.es: - Tú la tomaste esta mañana.- Es mía.

translation.en: You bought the safe, but the medication is mine.
translation.es: Compraste la caja fuerte, pero la medicina es mía.

translation.en: -No, I bought the medication, too. -That's the important part.
translation.es: - Yo compré la medicina.- Esa es la parte importante.

translation.en: -I didn't say... -You tried to buy it.
-I swiped the card. -I didn't say I'm paying for it?
translation.es: - Pasé la tarjeta.- ¿No dije que pagaba?

translation.en: -You said you were. -We have a witness.
translation.es: - Dijiste que ibas.- Tenemos un testigo.

translation.en: You said it. But I'm the one whose...
translation.es: Lo dijiste. Pero a mi fue...

translation.en: -Whose bank account got charged? -Oh, so I lied?
I'm paying for it. It's mine.
I'm gonna hold it, that's all.
translation.es: Me voy a quedar con ella, es todo.

translation.en: You're running away from me? Give me the...
What, are you chasing me? You're chasing me.
I'm not chasing you. You're walking.
Stop moving around the table. Stop moving.
translation.es: Deja de moverte por la mesa.Deja de moverte.
- No lo estoy...- Para. Esto es estúpido.

translation.en: I got the bad knee. You know I got the bad knee.
translation.es: Tengo la rodilla mala.Sabes que tengo la rodilla mala.

translation.en: You know I'm gonna catch you if you want me to.
translation.es: Sabes que puedo atraparte si quiero.

translation.en: -Andy! Andy! -I'll tell you right now, I won't stop.
I don't know why you're making a big deal out of it.
translation.es: No sé por qué haces un drama al respecto.
- Yo soy el moribundo.- De acuerdo. Bien.

translation.en: -I'm the dying guy. -All right. Shut up with that.
-You're being a stupid idiot. -I'm being stupid? I'm the dying guy.
translation.es: - Estás diciendo estupideces.- ¿Yo soy un estúpido? Soy el moribundo.

translation.en: -I know you're the dying guy. Stop. -I'm the dying guy!
translation.es: - Sé que eres el moribundo.- Soy el moribundo.

translation.en: Thirty-two dogs. Twenty of them ate cats.
-The code is one, two, three, four? -See? You're not that smart.
translation.es: ¿Es uno, dos, tres, cuatro? ¿Ves? No eres tan inteligente.

translation.en: through all of this. I just can't.
translation.es: con todo esto. Simplemente no puedo.

translation.en: [grunts] Your stove is still acting stupid.
translation.es: Tu estufa todavía está actuando estúpida.

translation.en: I think I might have burnt it a little on the bottom, but I think it's okay.
translation.es: Quizás quemamos el fondo, pero creo que está bien.

translation.en: There's more fighting in this than I remember.
translation.es: Hay más peleas de las que recuerdo.

translation.en: Your friend Dave would love it.
translation.es: A tu amigo Dave le encantaría.

translation.en: I'll get it in a sec.
Chien, when you woke this morning,
did you think it would be for the last time?
-[Andy] Can I open them? -Biggest surprise of your life.
translation.es: - ¿Los abro?- La mejor sorpresa de tu vida.

translation.en: You still got cancer that's killing you?
translation.es: ¿Aún tienes un cáncer que te está matando?

translation.en: Feels like there's a little more.
translation.es: Se siente como que hay un poco más.

translation.en: It doesn't all come, you know?
[laughs wryly] You don't have to sit in here if you don't want to.
translation.es: No tienes que sentarte aquí si no quieres.

translation.en: It sounded like you got all of it out, though.
translation.es: Sonaba como si hubieses sacado todo.

translation.en: The one from the gas station is River Kickers.
translation.es: El de la gasolinera es River Kickers.

translation.en: Which way to the ancient healer?
I want to go when I feel good. I don't want to go when it's hurting.
translation.es: Quiero irme sintiéndome bien.No quiero irme con dolor.

translation.en: Yeah, but it's not gonna stay that way. You know, I'd like to do it when I feel...
translation.es: Sí, pero no va a seguir así.Me gustaría hacerlo cuando me sienta...

translation.en: I should have took off from work. You know, I should have took off.
translation.es: Debí pedir días libres del trabajo.

translation.en: A month ago. We could've done more stuff.
translation.es: Hace un mes. Pudimos hacer más cosas.

translation.en: I wish I had done that.

translation.es: - Chicos...- No lo vas a adivinar.

translation.en: You know, go back... Go forward in your life
translation.es: Ustedes saben... A seguir adelante con sus vidas.

translation.en: and imagine where you are and if you had a chance--
translation.es: Imaginen dónde estány si tuviesen una oportunidad...

translation.en: You're my best friend. I know you.
translation.es: Eres mi mejor amigo. Te conozco.

translation.en: Also, I heard you practicing it through the vent about 100 times.
translation.es: Además, te oí practicarloa través del ventilador unas 100 veces.

translation.en: You seem really good right now. You know, you seem like...
translation.es: Pareces estar bien ahora mismo. Pareces...
Tal vez hay... Yo no sé.
- Así que, 100 de estas chupadoras.- Sí.

translation.en: I don't even know if you had to buy this particular pill.
translation.es: No sé si tenías que compraresta pastilla en particular.

translation.en: A hundred of anything, really, would...
I wonder if they do that...
-You're spilling it on the side now. -Oh, sorry.
translation.es: - Estás derramándolas por el lado.- Lo siento.

translation.en: Well, sorry. We got to go back now, right?
-You never told me that? -I never told anybody that.
translation.es: - ¿Nunca me contaste eso?- Nunca lo dije.

translation.en: I used to feel so bad about it.
translation.es: Solía sentirme tan mal por eso.

translation.en: I left her. It was awful.
"Oh, I know I need to be alone.
I'm convinced. That's what I need to do. I need to be alone."
translation.es: Estaba convencido. Es lo que necesitaba hacer. Estar solo.

translation.en: And then I ended up here...
and you were looking at this apartment
-when Barry was showing it to you... -Yeah.
translation.es: - cuando Barry te lo estaba mostrando.- Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, I didn't want you to get it.
translation.es: Claro, no quería que lo tuvieras.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I didn't know you were gonna be a cool guy and everything.
translation.es: Sí, pero no sabía ibas a seralguien tan divertido.

translation.en: I told Barry you look like one of those guys...
translation.es: Le dije a Barry que parecías un...

translation.en: you know, you see on the news. He's got a...
translation.es: sabes, lo ves en las noticias. El que...

translation.en: He's got a freezer full of hands and feet.
translation.es: tiene un congelador lleno de manos y pies.

translation.en: I told Barry, I said, "Eh, why don't you keep looking?"
translation.es: Le dije a Barry,"¿Por qué no sigues buscando?".

translation.en: I've seen people look at me like that in...
translation.es: He visto a gente mirarme así en...

translation.en: -People look at me like that all the time. -Yeah.
translation.es: - La gente me mira así todo el tiempo.- Sí.

translation.en: Oh, God. We gotta deal with this.
translation.es: Ay, Dios. Tenemos que lidiar con esto.

translation.en: I mean, it's now or never, so...
translation.es: Digo, es ahora o nunca, así que...

translation.en: I'll just tell you if you want.
I don't think you're gonna like it though.
translation.es: Creo que no te va a gustar.
- Uno nunca sabe.- Espero que sí.
- Sí, lo es.- No es "cerdo graso."

translation.en: -Why would you do that to me? -Because when we do puzzles...
translation.es: - ¿Por qué me harías eso?- Porque al hacer el rompecabezas...

translation.en: it's a lot of work and...

translation.es: no es fácil, pero es divertido.

translation.en: And there's a finish. There's something real you can finish.
translation.es: Y hay un final.Hay algo real que puedes terminar.

translation.en: I know, but you always look sad when we'd finish.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero siempre estás tristecuando terminamos.

translation.en: -I don't look sad. No, I don't. -You always look a little sad.
You don't see it. I see it.
We're happy, we're done, we got it.
And then you get a little sad. I thought, "You know what?
translation.es: Después te pones un poco triste.Pensé, ¿sabes qué?
Nunca va a entender esta camisa.

translation.en: This will be his favorite shirt."
I thought you were a killer. I...
translation.es: Pensé que eras un asesino. Yo...

translation.en: gave you a shirt with no answer.
translation.es: te di una camisa sin respuesta.

translation.en: Come on, that's the last one. We got to...
translation.es: Vamos, esa es la última. Tengo que...

translation.en: "Fill the glass with four ounces of water."
translation.es: Llenar el vaso con cuatro onzas de agua.

translation.en: It's bitter, so you're gonna drink it all at once.
translation.es: Es amarga, así que la vas a beber rápida.

translation.en: -And then a few minutes later... -I remember that part.
translation.es: - Y en unos minutos después...- Yo recuerdo esa parte.

translation.en: The yellow one is for anti-vomiting.
translation.es: La amarilla es para no vomitar.

translation.en: That's the thing. If you vomit this up then it's all for nothing.
translation.es: Esa es la cosa. Si lo vomitas todo,no habrá servido de nada.
Esta es para calmar la ansiedad.

translation.en: If you take it and then...
translation.es: Si te la tomas y luego...

translation.en: I don't want that. I want to be in my head.
translation.es: No quiero eso. Quiero estar consciente.

translation.en: -All right, I'll keep this. -I don't need that but I'll take this.
translation.es: - Me quedo con esto.- No lo necesito, pero me lo llevaré.

translation.en: Takes an hour. After you take that pill...
translation.es: Toma una hora. Después que tomes esa píldora...

translation.en: I got to wait an hour after?
You got to wait an hour for that to take effect, yeah.
translation.es: Tienes que esperar una horapara que haga efecto.

translation.en: All right, we should have taken...
[Andy] Let me go... Hold on. Hold on.
-Go ahead. -Tell me when you swallow it.
Now, so we just wait an hour?
Hmm. You got to wait an hour.
Yeah, you should feel free to sell the car.
I don't think you should be driving, anyway.
translation.es: Además, no creo que debas estar manejando.

translation.en: I do think you should keep my phone though.
translation.es: Creo que deberíasquedarte con mi teléfono.

translation.en: -Nah, I don't want it. -What do you mean, "nah"?
translation.es: - No.- ¿A qué te refieres con no?

translation.en: Don't you think it's time you get a phone?
translation.es: ¿No crees que sea horade tener un teléfono?

translation.en: You don't get e-mail right? You can't get e-mail on it.
[Andy] There's nothing wrong. I'll keep it. I just want a good one.
translation.es: No hay nada malo. Yo lo guardo.Solo quiero uno bueno.

translation.en: [Michael] You don't even know how to do e-mail on a phone.
translation.es: No sabes enviar un e-mail en un teléfono.

translation.en: -You don't know what you're doing. -It comes with instructions, right?
translation.es: - No sabes lo que haces.- Viene con instrucciones.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm smelling a tree.

translation.es: - Nunca lo había olido.- Hay insectos.

translation.en: What's it gonna do to me now?
translation.es: ¿Y ahora qué me va a hacer?

translation.en: I don't know. There's a lot of larvae and stuff on there.
translation.es: No sé. Hay muchas larvas y cosas ahí.

translation.en: There's something I do want to talk to you about that...
translation.es: Hay algo que quiero hablar contigo...

translation.en: I don't think you're gonna like...
translation.es: que creo que no te va a gusta.

translation.en: and I could somehow contact you...
translation.es: y de alguna manera podría... contactarte...

translation.en: You know, like the woman in the hotel. She hangs out with her husband, you know.
translation.es: Como la mujer en el hotel, entiendes. Ella se contacta con su esposo.

translation.en: She's saying what she feels. You don't mean real. I mean, that's...
translation.es: Ella dice lo que siente. No quieres decir que sea real. Eso...

translation.en: -That's just in movies and stuff, right? -But on the...
translation.es: - Ocurre en las películas y en esas cosas.- Pero si hay...

translation.en: This is a tough one for me.
-I don't know. -I could send you a signal.
translation.es: - No lo sé.- Puedo enviarte una señal.

translation.en: Push the water glass a little bit or...
translation.es: Puedo empujar el vaso de agua un poco o...

translation.en: -leave you a note in the foggy mirror... -No. No, don't do that.
translation.es: - dejar una nota en un espejo empañado.- No. - Lo haré.- No, no hagas eso.

translation.en: No, no. Do not do that.
No moaning through the vent. No, "woo."
translation.es: Ni gemir a través del ventilador.

translation.en: You know, you did now. Now I'm just gonna think anything weird...
translation.es: Ya que lo hiciste ahora. Cuando me pase algo extraño...

translation.en: I'm gonna think it's you. The wind, it's you.
translation.es: Voy a pensar que eres tú. El viento eres tú.

translation.en: Let's just pick something right now, so I know everything else...
translation.es: Vamos a escoger algo ahora. Así ya sé que todo lo demás...

translation.en: That's what I was getting at in the first...
translation.es: Ahí es donde iba desde un principio.
Acabo de darme cuenta de algo.

translation.en: I guess we could do it on the couch. I mean, I'm here.
translation.es: Creo que podría ser en el sofá. Digo... Ya estoy aquí.

translation.en: I mean, that makes sense, right?
-It's our spot. -It's our place, right? Yeah.
I don't want to do it on the couch.
translation.es: No quiero hacerlo en el sofá.

translation.en: If I was on the floor, I'd be closer to the door.
translation.es: Si estuviera en el piso,estaría más cerca de la puerta.
- Para cuando...- Si es lo que quieres.

translation.en: I don't want to do it on the floor.
translation.es: No quiero hacerlo en el piso.

translation.en: You all right? You want me to...
I want to do it in here.
-Should I lay down? -You wanna lay down?
I'm starting to... I'm shaking a little bit.
translation.es: Estoy teniendo un ataque... Estoy temblando un poco.

translation.en: Yeah, you don't have to be scared. I think it's gonna be okay.
translation.es: No tienes que estar asustado.Creo que va a estar bien.

translation.en: I think everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Creo que todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: -[cries] I'm scared. -I don't think you gotta get scared, Mike.
translation.es: - Estoy asustado.- No estés asustado, Mike.

translation.en: I think it's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Creo que va a estar bien.

translation.en: [cries] I shouldn't have taken the pill.

translation.es: Todo va a estar bien, Michael.

translation.en: -It's gonna be okay. All right. -[cries] Okay.
translation.es: - Todo va a estar bien.- Está bien.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. 'Cause I know. I got a feeling.
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. Por que lo presiento.

translation.en: I got a feeling, man. I got a feeling about this.
Oh, my God. I'm already-- Give me your hand. Hey.
translation.es: Ay, Dios mío. Ya estoy... Dame tu mano. Oye.

translation.en: I want to tell you I love you.
I'm gonna close my eyes now, okay?
translation.es: Voy a cerrar mis ojos ahora, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: See you down the road, friend.
translation.es: Te veo en el camino, amigo.

translation.en: Uh, yeah. We're moving into C.
translation.es: Sí. Nos mudamos al apartamento C.

translation.en: -[woman] So you are in what apartment? -[Andy] I'm in F.
translation.es: - ¿Estás en qué apartamento?- Estoy en el F.

translation.en: -[woman] Hey, thank you so much. -All right. Yeah.
You got the best apartment, actually.
translation.es: De hecho, tienes el mejor apartamento.

translation.en: Oh. You hear that? Best apartment.
You're lucky, actually, that you got this one.
You can answer him. Tell him.
He doesn't have to. I'm Andy.
translation.es: No tiene que decirme. Soy Andy.

translation.en: So, I guess you like games then, Evan, huh?

translation.es: - No.- No. Porque lo inventamos nosotros.
Es como jugar con una bola y raquetapero tienes que...

translation.en: but you gotta imagine this whole wall here, right?
translation.es: Es como jugar con una bola y raquetapero tienes que... Imagina una pared aquí, ¿verdad?

translation.en: You hit a ball against it.
And you got to get it into a barrel that's over here.
translation.es: Tienes que meterla en un barrilque estaría por aquí.

translation.en: We put a barrel right there.
And, uh, it doesn't sound like a lot of fun, but it is.
translation.es: No suena muy divertido, pero lo es.

translation.en: It's good. It's fun. Yeah. I'll show you one day.
translation.es: Es bueno. Es divertido. Te enseñaré algún día.

translation.en: I got a great football half-time speech, too.
translation.es: También tengo un discursode medio tiempo de fútbol.
